SELECT B.BID BID, B.BCID BCID, M.MNAME MNAME, B.BTITLE BTITLE , B.BPICK BPICK, B.BCREATE BCREATE, B.BUPDATE BUPDATE, B.BVIEWCOUNT BVIEWCOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MID = M.MID WHERE B.MID=${mid } AND
B.BCID=0 AND
B.BCID=1 AND
B.BCID=2 AND
B.BCID=3 AND
(B.BCID=0 OR B.BCID=1 OR B.BCID=2 OR B.BCID=3) AND
(B.BTITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchword }||'%' OR B.BCONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchword }||'%') AND
B.BTITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchword }||'%' AND
B.BCONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchword }||'%' AND
B.BSTATE='A' ORDER BY B.BID DESC
